title: Chapter 1439 - Sealing Heaven And Earth, Restricting True Immortals
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1439 - Sealing Heaven And Earth, Restricting True Immortals

Bang!

Bao Wentai shattered into a rain of light.

Su Yi then turned his attention toward the distant Xiao Changning, his gaze cold and cruel, without so much as the slightest ripple of emotion.

As if he were staring at a blade of grass, a rock, or… an ant!

His gaze made Xiao Changning, a Void Realm True Immortal, extraordinarily uncomfortable. His brow furrowed. “I don’t understand. You…”

But before he could finish his sentence, Su Yi disappeared into thin air. 

A moment later, a streak of sword qi appeared as if cleaving through time and space and descended upon Xiao Changning.

A spear appeared in Xiao Changning’s grip, which he swung furiously through the air.

Clang!!!

The terrifying, tyrannical power of reincarnation burst from the sword qi, making the spear wail and shake. Xiao Changning’s aura churned, and he was sent staggering back.

He couldn't help but be astonished, and his face filled with disbelief. Is it really possible for a Transcendent to possess such power!?

He was a Void Realm True Immortal. Even as a revenant, he was comparable to a living early-stage Void Realm expert.

Yet now, a young man who’d only just stepped onto the Path of Transcendence had forced him back in a single slash. This was simply unheard...
original_title: Chapter 1439 - Sealing Heaven and Earth, Restricting True Immortals
